object.name: InputContactMessageContent
object.description: Represents the content of a contact message to be sent as the result of an inline query.
object.html_description: Represents the content of a contact message to be sent as the result of an inline query.
object.rst_description: Represents the `content <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#inputmessagecontent>`_ of a contact message to be sent as the result of an inline query.

annotations.description: Additional data about the contact in the form of a vCard, 0-2048 bytes
annotations.html_description: Optional. Additional data about the contact in the form of a vCard, 0-2048 bytes
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Additional data about the contact in the form of a `vCard <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/VCard>`_, 0-2048 bytes
annotations.name: vcard
